email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this email finds you well. I am reaching out to offer a shipment of 150,000MT of Iron Ore from Tubarao to Qingdao on CIF terms.

The vessel we propose is the OCEAN HARMONY, with a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 300m. The laycan is set for 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25. The initial freight quote is USD 18.50 per MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. Given the current market conditions, I was hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 17.75 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Emily Carter
Global Freight

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 18.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 20,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 18.00 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Emily Carter
Global Freight

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Tubarao on 2023-10-20, with a 24-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Iron Ore - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Emily Carter
Global Freight
